interlinear-text.item: 2014T1 How Sali lost his leg (with comment from 2015.III.S12)

word.item: I went to the bush for cleangin shoots of marita. I was cutting a tree napi. The tree broke and fell down on the beach. I turned back (and was about to go) when the tree came and hit me.
cf. 27 : muse-wafle-ne. uafle seul co racine.
Then I fell down and the tree hit my leg and broke it.
Once my leg broken, I laid there alone and I called Sati's boy: "I'm really bad".
Then, once all the big women and the big men had arrived, they (?) took me, hold me, and carried me on the top of a "bed", and we went to the village.
While I'm laying I pray with paster Tom.
While they pray the blood sprung out like water.
cf. ci dessus pour le champ tx : nomo spiiale alterne avec nomosi piale. De plus, dans ce champ : mai : male.
‎ One ce blood have sprung out like water, ‎‎I lay, the eye closed (?), as a dead man (?).
Then they took me and carry me in Joshua's house.
After laying some time, paster Tom and his (the?) son Seilas go to Sumwari.
They go fetch a motor kanu.
Then saturday morning(?), Anton went down bringing the canoe.
After he kame down I went upstream and arrive to Sumwari. Friday I slept there. Saturday I went inside the plane and we leaved.
‎‎A car kame, take me and go down to the hospital. kar i kam antap kisim i go
The sunday I go down to the hospital and stay there. They work on the leg. I stay in the hospital for two month.
liia = v ? ou bien : hele nefe iaamela
I stay steptember, october, november, december, and then the first week and the second week.
After two weeks they cut my leg.
After (? times) I kame back to sumwari with the plane.
Once completely dried, I made some money and went back (again 2015.p. 50).
mo+o- et non m+o- parce que lexème = ho- ?
I sit down in a boat.
The ship arrived to Madang. I go into a car and go to Lae.
belle série de verbes de déplacement
At Lae I stay one complete week. I take a false leg and then, I came back.
Then I (bought?) a false leg and (kisim pinis) went back.
Then I slept here, I work taro, sweet potato, garden, hause, work... algeta
Today I do (have ?) all kind of work.
(contexte: yu gat kaikai?) yes, mi gat sampla.
